posts.title: Swiss Army Nail Clippers
posts.content: Keep your fingernails perfectly manicured at all times by making these Swiss Army nail clippers part of your everyday carry. They’re crafted from premium stainless steel, given a nice satin finish, feature a sharp curved edge, and come in a handy black leather pouch.

posts.title: SmartKey Enabled Dog Door
posts.content: Keep unwanted critters from wandering into your home with the smartkey enabled dog door. Unlike old fashioned dog doors, this high tech version equips your doggy with a specialized key which emits a signal that opens the door when they’re ready to come in.

posts.title: Belly Face Temporary Tattoos
posts.content: Ditch the six pack abs and create a truly distinguishable look with these belly face temporary tattoos. With a multitude of faces to choose from, these temporary tattoo faces will add realism whilst you immaturely use your stomach fat to talk to people.

posts.title: World’s Smallest Stick On LED
posts.content: Illuminate the darkest and hardest to reach places with ease using the world’s smallest stick on LED. Virtually indestructible, this light comes with a high strength adhesive that’ll stick anywhere and includes long lasting alkaline batteries.

posts.title: Whack-A-Mole Cat Toy
posts.content: Keep yourself and your feline friend entertained for hours on end with the whack-a-mole cat toy. Simply poke the blue mouse on a stick through the various holes and provide a thrilling carnival style test of reflexes for Mr. Fluffums.

posts.title: Broadway Styled Light Cord
posts.content: Introduce a charming theater vibe to any room in your home using this Broadway styled light cord. This handy fifteen foot light cord comes outfitted with six standard light sockets with two feet spacing in between – making it ideal for either indoor or outdoor use.

posts.title: Gran Turismo Racing Wheel Controller
posts.content: Get a real world racing experience without leaving your couch by getting your hands on the Gran Turismo racing wheel controller. It features a comfortable leather-wrapped grip and is designed to accurately replicate everything from road surface to tire grip.

posts.title: Latte Art Printer Coffee Maker
posts.content: One-up your local barista with an art school degree by creating your own masterpieces with this latte art printer coffee maker. This unique coffee maker utilizes delicious edible ink to print your artwork onto the surface of your latte in just 10 seconds.

posts.title: Writer’s Block Journal
posts.content: Overcome your creative slump by finding inspiration within the pages of the Writer’s Block Journal. This unique journal features a distinct wood-grain cover and comes with 300 blank pages that are ready to be filled with your passion filled mind.

posts.title: Bedside Storage Caddy
posts.content: Help keep your pigsty of a room a little more organized by placing some of your essential belongings in the bedside storage caddy. The functional design fits conveniently under the mattress and comes with a slew of pockets that are ideal for storage.

posts.title: Dual Foot Massager Roller
posts.content: Show your hard working feet some love by pampering yourself with this dual foot massager roller. This soothing roller is designed to help relieve arch pain as well as plantar fasciitis and features a compact size so that you can take it virtually anywhere.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Adhesive Vinyl
posts.content: Give your arts and crafts projects a little added flair by using this glow in the dark adhesive vinyl for the job. This nine inch by four foot vinyl adheres to a variety of flat surfaces and can easily be cut – making it ideal for all types of projects.
